arts.ttl: Marcus Rashford Man Utd recall from Aston Villa discussed as Amad Diallo confirms injury
arts.sum: Manchester United fans have urged the club to recall Marcus Rashford from his loan at Aston Villa in the wake of an injury to Amad Diallo. Marcus Rashford Man Utd recall from Aston Villa discussed as Amad Diallo confirms injury

arts.ttl: Ten-man Ipswich earn draw against Aston Villa
arts.sum: A victory would have taken Ipswich level on points with 17th-placed Wolverhampton Wanderers in the Premier League table, but Watkins broke their resolve on the rebound after half-time substitute Marcus Rashford struck the woodwork from a free-kick. Marco Asensio squandered two good chances to win it for Villa, then Palmer made a heroic save to deny Rogers deep into stoppage time as Ipswich held on to their point.

arts.ttl: Ten-man Ipswich showed 'fight' in draw at Villa - McKenna
arts.sum: Boss Kieran McKenna says his team are "fighting until the last breath" as 10-man Ipswich hold on to draw 1-1 at Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: Unai Emery ‘frustrated’ by Aston Villa display against ten-man Ipswich
arts.sum: Unai Emery was left deeply “frustrated” by his Aston Villa players on Saturday, accusing them of failing to follow his instructions as they drew 1-1 with Ipswich Town. The Tractor Boys were reduced to ten men in the first half after Axel Tuanzebe was sent off for two bookable offences, but took the lead at […] The post Unai Emery ‘frustrated’ by Aston Villa display against ten-man Ipswich first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Unai Emery gives Boubacar Kamara and Leon Bailey updates after Aston Villa's draw with Ipswich
arts.sum: Unai Emery gives Boubacar Kamara and Leon Bailey updates after Aston Villa's draw with Ipswich Aston Villa manager Unai Emery gave updates on Boubacar Kamara and Leon Bailey after the draw with Ipswich

arts.ttl: Every word Unai Emery said about Rashford, Asensio, dropped points and injuries after Ipswich draw
arts.sum: Every word Unai Emery said about Rashford, Asensio, dropped points and injuries after Ipswich draw "They didn’t have many good chances but they were getting to our box and after the sending off, the match changed completely.

arts.ttl: A brilliant day – Ipswich boss Kieran McKenna lauds debutant keeper Alex Palmer
arts.sum: The 28-year-old helped his side hold on for a point at Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: Debutant keeper Alex Palmer inspires 10-man Ipswich to valuable draw at Villa
arts.sum: Palmer pulled off a string of saves to frustrate the hosts.

arts.ttl: John Townley's Villa player ratings after 1-1 draw with 10-man Ipswich Town
arts.sum: Marcus Rashford was introduced for the start of the second half, replacing Jacob Ramsey, as Lucas Digne made way for Ian Maatsen. Manchester United loanee Rashford then rattled the bar from a free-kick and the ball fell for Watkins to convert on the rebound with just over 20 minutes left to play.

arts.ttl: Why Leon Bailey is not included in Aston Villa squad as injury problems continue
arts.sum: Aston Villa winger Leon Bailey misses this afternoon's Premier League clash against Ipswich Town due to injury Aston Villa have suffered a fresh injury blow as Leon Bailey has not been included in the matchday squad to face Ipswich Town.
